#PSEUDOCODE 3.1
#Step 1
```{r Pseudocode 3.1 Step 1}
p <- 0.2
N <- 50
```
#Step 2

```{r Pseudocode 3.1 Step 2}
Po <- (1-p)^N
```

#Step 3
```{r Pseudocode 3.1 Step 3}
probKN <- function (N,p,k){
  p=0.2
  N=50
  k <- seq(1,N,by=1)
  p.vec <- vector(length=length(k), "numeric")
  p.vec[1] <- ((N-1+1)/1)*((p)/(1-p))*Po

  for (i in k) {
  p.vec[i+1] = ((N-i+1)/k)*((p)/(1-p))*p.vec[i]
  
  }
  return(p.vec)
}
```
